mapper.update: update order_goods set good_id = #{goodId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, pay_channel_id = #{payChannelId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, quantity = #{quantity,jdbcType=INTEGER}, price = #{price,jdbcType=INTEGER}, actual_price = #{actualPrice,jdbcType=INTEGER}, order_id = #{orderId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, created_at = #{createdAt,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, updated_at = #{updatedAt,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select id, good_id, pay_channel_id, quantity, price, actual_price, order_id, created_at, updated_at from order_goods where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
select id, good_id, pay_channel_id, quantity, price, actual_price, order_id, created_at, updated_at from order_goods
